author: Jeremy Torr
title: Association of Asia Pacific Airlines | aviation infrastructure | Associations
text:
The aviation infrastructure in Asia is just keeping up with demand, according to Association of Asia Pacific Airlines (AAPA) DG Andrew Herdman. He added the region is still searching for the best way to build and run airports and traffic control ...
